description.p: Aleph One is the open source continuation of Bungie's Marathon 2 FPS game engine. Aleph One plays Marathon, Marathon 2, Marathon Infinity, and 3rd-party content on a wide array of platforms, with (optional) OpenGL rendering, Internet play, Lua scripting, and more.
Binary releases and scenario files are available at the Aleph One web site:
For more information and instructions on compiling from source, check out the Aleph One wiki: https://github.com/Aleph-One-Marathon/alephone/wiki
